query:
SELECT ce.id, ce.userId, ce.courseId, c.title, c.framework, ce.paymentStatus, ce.status, ce.enrolledAt 
FROM course_enrollments ce 
LEFT JOIN courses c ON ce.courseId = c.id 
ORDER BY ce.userId, ce.enrolledAt DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT ce.id, ce.userId, ce.courseId, c.title, c.framework, ce.paymentStatus, ce.status, ce.enrolledAt 
FROM course_enrollments ce 
LEFT JOIN courses c ON ce.courseId = c.id 
ORDER BY ce.userId, ce.enrolledAt DESC;
